sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01
UPPER(EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE UPPER('%' || #eaiBizCode# || '%')
UPPER(UBMUGIGN) LIKE UPPER('%' || #searchUbmugign# || '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EAIBZWKDSTCD) ROWNO , EAIBZWKDSTCD , TRANCODE , STARTBIT , SYSMODE , SYSTYPE , SYSSEND , SYSRECV , UBMUGIGN , UBMUSEQ FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01
UPPER(EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE UPPER('%' || #eaiBizCode# || '%')
UPPER(UBMUGIGN) LIKE UPPER('%' || #searchUbmugign# || '%')
) WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
